description.en: Based on the features that blockchain technology ensures the data stored in the blockchain system are both non-tamperable and traceable, GUSS.ONE establishes a transparent and reliable decentralized online platform that specializes in sports betting. The platform not only ensures the transparency and standardization of the prize pool and betting policies and regulations, but also guarantees that the betting result and the distribution of all the prizes to be fair and just and non-tamperable. As a decentralized sports betting platform, GUSS.ONE is set to provide all users around the world with various types of experience in sports betting. The platform allows anyone to become the dealer and enjoys the fun of being a dealer. The platform will also determine the rules of the game by smart contract and lock the deposit into the smart contract to make sure that each dealer is able to pay their debts.
